faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common inquiries about our video chapter generation tool

items.title: What types of videos can chapters be generated for?
items.description: The tool works with a variety of video formats including tutorials, webinars, and vlogs, making it versatile for any content creator.

items.title: Is the chapter generation tool free to use?
items.description: Yes! Users can generate up to five videos for free each month. For higher volumes, explore our subscription options.

items.title: Can I edit the generated chapters?
items.description: Absolutely! Once chapters are generated, you can easily edit them to suit your specific requirements.

items.title: How is my video data handled?
items.description: All videos are processed in your browser without uploading to our servers, ensuring full privacy and data security.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Videos?
